title: Koplany
text:
Koplany is a <a href="village">village</a> in the administrative district of <a href="Gmina%20Juchnowiec%20Ko%C5%9Bcielny">Gmina Juchnowiec Kościelny</a>, within <a href="Bia%C5%82ystok%20County">Białystok County</a>, <a href="Podlaskie%20Voivodeship">Podlaskie Voivodeship</a>, in north-eastern Poland. It lies approximately north of <a href="Juchnowiec%20Ko%C5%9Bcielny">Juchnowiec Kościelny</a> and south-west of the regional capital <a href="Bia%C5%82ystok">Białystok</a>.
The village has a population of 290.
References.
